content:
Over 30 trade agreements with other countries still need to be concluded by the end of March

AS A MEMBER of the European Union, Britain participates in around 40 free-trade agreements with over 70 countries, covering around 15% of Britain’s trade. The government has said that it aims to reach bilateral agreements with these countries, so that the deals roll over even if Britain leaves the EU on March 29th without a deal. “[P]eople should be reassured that the government is taking a responsible approach,” it has soothed.

But an official document leaked to the Sun newspaper shows that just six deals are on track to meet the end-March deadline. They include one with the Faroe Islands; Faroese-British trade amounts to around £250m a year (about 0.02% of Britain’s total foreign trade). An agreement with Switzerland that was announced on Monday counts for more.

Other reasonably big deals with countries like Canada, South Korea and non-EU countries in the European Economic Area such as Norway and Iceland are off track. Sizeable deals with Japan, Turkey and Singapore are simply not possible to conclude by March 29th, according to the leaked document. As with other things Brexit, time is running out.

wp.Bilateral Filtering: 双边滤波;双边滤波器;双向滤波器
wp.Bilateral filter: 双边滤波器;滤波器;双向濾波器;双边滤波
wp.bilateral transducer: 双向换能器;双向传感器;双向变换器;		可逆传感器
wp.bilateral contract: 双务合同;双边;双务契约;		双边合同
wp.bilateral arrangement: 双边协议;双边承运协定;多边协议;两侧排布

eg2: China and the United States concluded [entered into] a bilateral trade agreement after long negotiations.
中美两国通过长期谈判后订立了一项双边贸易协定。
No, we need to build trust with the Russians on  security matters —relations between them and us, one on one.
不，我们需要和俄罗斯人建立双边安全问题互信——他们与我们之间的关系，一对一的关系。
To date, only Germany and South Korea have bilateral agreements with China.
迄今为止，只有德国和韩国于中国签订了双边协议。

wp.reasonably probable: 合理可能;账面金额合理可能

ex: adv. 合理地；相当地；适度地
eg2: As with any standards, they must be reasonably applied.
跟任何标准一样，必须合理应用它们。
But from an economy perspective, I feel  okay with what we did.
不过从经济角度来看，我感觉我们当时的做法是合理的。
A supported query is a query that you can reasonably expect the users to make of your data.
受支持的查询是这样一种查询，即您可以合理地预期用户怎么对待您的数据。

wp.R REASSURE: 使新学员和初学者消除疑惑

ex: vt. 使…安心，使消除疑虑

wp.Mind Soothe: 精神安抚;安抚心灵;安抚;精神安慰

eg2: But the release, apparently, was not enough to  China’s fury.
但是很明显释放中国船长并不足以缓和中国的愤怒。
And yet I never stopped loving him and using his love like a battery booster whenever I needed to rev up my courage or soothe my sagging spirit.
但是，我对他的爱从未停止过。 而他的爱更是我的充电器，在我需要勇气或是意志消沉的时候给我鼓励和安慰。
Actually there is no necessary relation between loneliness and lover. Some people just use it as an excuse to soothe themselves after the failure of love.
你是否找恋人跟你现在是否寂寞这根本就不着边际，只不过是有些人在恋爱失败之后的一个借口，用来安慰自己的借口。

Title: A no-deal Brexit would affect more than just British trade with the EU

paperStatistics.title: A no-deal Brexit would affect more than just British trade with the EU
paperStatistics.desc: Over 30 trade agreements with other countries still need to be concluded by the end of March
